questions.describe: Your company sells large mainframes that are delivered in one delivery but are paid for with several regular installments. What type of schedule should you set up?

answerOptions.describe: Default Quantity Schedule
Default Revenue Schedule
Default Revenue and Quantity Schedule
Don't create any default schedule

questions.describe: A sales rep can create a quote from:

answerOptions.describe: An Account and its Opportunities
An Opportunity and its Products
A Product and its Price Book
A Contact and its Assets

questions.describe: Who can benefit from the Quotes feature? (3 opt)

answerOptions.describe: A customer who wants to get a quote from Salesforce
A sales rep who wants to create and email a PDF quote from Salesforce
An Administrator who wants to manage quoting in Salesforce

questions.describe: How do you create a new quote for a customer?

answerOptions.describe: Select an Account and click "New Quote"
Click the Quotes tab, then click "New Quote"
Select an Opportunity, then click "New Quote"
Select a Contact and click "New Quote"

questions.describe: You can apply a discount to the entire quote; there is no need to apply discounts to individual line items in the quote.

answerOptions.describe: True
False

questions.describe: When editing a quote, you can edit which of the following? (3 opt)

answerOptions.describe: The discount to apply to the entire quote including all line items
The quote name and status
The expiration date of the quote
The contact and address information of the customer

questions.describe: The quotes syncing process synchronizes updates between:

answerOptions.describe: Different sales reps working on the same quote.
Various products in an opportunity
A quote and the opportunity it was created from
Different quotes created from the sames opportunity

questions.describe: You want to sync a new quote with its opportunity, but an old quote is already syncing. What should you do first?

answerOptions.describe: Open new quote detail page so you can start syncing process
Check the syncing checkbox for new quote in the quote related list on the opportunity
Uncheck the syncing checkbox for the old quote
Stop the syncing for the old quote

questions.describe: To create a PDF file of your quote, click "Create PDF" on the quote detail page.

answerOptions.describe: True
False

questions.describe: Once you save a PDF quote, the file is automatically emailed to the customer.

answerOptions.describe: True
False

Allowing sync to run regularly in the background
Setting up sync schedule in Salesforce
Setting up sync schedule in Outlook

answerOptions.describe: Contacts
Tasks
Accounts
Events
Emails
